Articles.Content: Keep going its starting to slow down too much. We were at 3 pages a refresh for me. Now we're down to 1.....

> 
> read ppl, kerbalX gives us an average of our guesses. so everytime someone enters a time it's recalculated...

We can't trust anyone... ONLY OUR HYPE!!
Guys and Gals it was a true honor to fly at the hype train this hypety day. we made history by breaking the hype meters. ONWARDS TO 400!!!
Keep going!

> 
> Keep going its starting to slow down too much. We were at 3 pages a refresh for me. Now we're down to 1.....

we have to do a *little* work!
Play the futurama theme while looking at this thread

> 
> Exactly this ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Let's hope he doesn't start trolling the hype train.. quick more hype coal so he can't catch us!
so excited!
I'll buy all of you a beer if we reach page 1000
The hype is unreal!
There was a public service announcement.

steam loaded some update down.

i don't have 0.90 anymore.

(for some reason it's 0.25 now)
Kasper sits in admin panel, whatever it is supposed to mean =)
Oh, is this still going? I popped off to have breakfast a few pages ago. Dunno why I expected it to slow down at 3000. Misplaced optimism, perhaps? Anyway, 25 to 75 minutes to go.

> 
> Guys and Gals it was a true honor to fly at the hype train this hypety day. we made history by breaking the hype meters. ONWARDS TO 400!!!

Indeed, it has been a great honor to be here on the 1.0 hypetrain.
The train burst through 300 pages and went on another 10 pages before showing any sign of slowing. Why are there 5 times as many guests as members online?

This song seems relevant:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bDktBZzQIiU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> i'll buy all of you a beer if we reach page 1000

...

Go! Now! Faster!
Keep pushing!

> 
> There was a public service announcement.

where?
I can just see the PDA after this update about how we hype too much and caused thousands of dollars of property damage to Squad's servers
Guys, we broke 300, but we can't stop now!
Apollo 11 launched at 20:18 UTC. My vote for the release time
The train is going so fast now that it's reversing dimensions!
In 30 minutes we have done 45 pages...
